articles.description: MOTD2 pundit Danny Murphy says Liverpool's draw at Old Trafford is not the end of the world for their title hopes - but they should have secured all three points.
articles.title: 'Positives for Liverpool - but a big chance missed'

articles.description: Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp warns Manchester United they will lose to Arsenal next month if they don't improve on their Old Trafford performance against his side.
articles.title: Klopp warns Man Utd must improve to beat Arsenal

articles.description: Which players impressed our football pundit Garth Crooks enough to make his latest Team of the Week?
articles.title: Who had his manager blowing kisses? Garth Crooks' Team of the Week

articles.description: Nuno Espirito Santo says James Maddison should have been sent off for "punching Ryan Yates in the stomach" during Nottingham Forest's defeat at Tottenham.
articles.title: Maddison should have seen red for punch, says Nuno

articles.description: Inter Milan could make Anthony Martial move, Wolves among options for Ansu Fati, Everton set Dominic Calvert-Lewin price, plus more.
articles.title: Inter Milan could make Martial move - Monday's gossip

articles.description: The Commonwealth Games Federation (CGF) says it is "considering multiple proposals" to host the event in 2026, amid continued uncertainty over its long-term future.
articles.title: Commonwealth Games: 'Multiple proposals' being considered for new 2026 host

articles.description: After an Old Firm game where everything changed several times, has anything really changed in the Scottish Premiership title race?
articles.title: What has changed in title race after Old Firm epic?

articles.description: World champion Mathieu van der Poel defends his Paris-Roubaix title with a stunning solo ride to win in record time.
articles.title: Paris-Roubaix: World champion Mathieu van der Poel defends his title

articles.description: Almost one year after starting, Russ Cook - more widely known as the Hardest Geezer - completes his challenge to run the length of Africa.
articles.title: Hardest Geezer: British man Russ Cook completes run across Africa

articles.description: Roma defender Gianluca Mancini faces an investigation after waving a flag depicting Lazio fans as 'rats'.
articles.title: Roma's Mancini investigated for Lazio 'rat' flag
